snippet.title: The Addams Family Longplay (Amiga) [50 FPS]
snippet.description:
Follow me on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/Al82_Retro
Get Great Retro Scene News @ http://www.vintageisthenewold.com
Developed and published by Ocean in 1992

* Reupload *
This is a re-upload to correct an error with the video stream present in the original cut.

Certainly one of the most polished platform games for the Amiga, The Addams Family reviewed well in magazines at the time of its release.

Unlike many similar titles, the game is surprisingly non-linear, allowing the player to tackle the various levels as they see fit.

It's also packed full of secret areas and bonuses - I manage to find a fair few, although I'm sure there are plenty more that I missed.

#theaddamsfamily
#amiga
#retrogaming
